casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Susan Marie MALONEY No. 198P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Michael E. Casterline, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Maloney, Susan Marie. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Stewart L. Johnson, Special Deputy Attorneys General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 16th of June 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
